itunes:title: Episode 726 - Special Guest Celebrity Criminal Pathologist Dr. Cyril Wecht

itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest criminal pathologist Dr. Cyril Wecht who has done over 21,000 autopsies and finally gives us the real answers on the deaths of Jonbenet Ramsey, JFK and RFK, Kurt Cobain, and why there was a person mis...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest criminal pathologist Dr. Cyril Wecht who has done over 21,000 autopsies and finally gives us the real answers on the deaths of Jonbenet Ramsey, JFK and RFK, Kurt Cobain, and why there was a person missing in the OJ Simpson murders.  You've seen him interviewed on every murder show and documentary, this is an episode you can't miss.
